title: Trigger MWAA DAG workflow via Amazon S3 event notification
description: Trigger a DAG workflow hosted in MWAA (Managed Wokflow for Apache Airflow) using input request files uploaded in a source S3 bucket

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This Terraform application deploys a MWAA (Managed Wokflow for Apache Airflow) instance with a `hello-world-dag` workflow, an input S3 bucket with event notifications to lambda. Lambda has been configured to trigger `hello-world-dag` workflow in MWAA for `input.json` file uploaded in the input S3 bucket.

bullets.text: Invoking DAGs with a Lambda Function

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
